titles.title: Commending and congratulating Virginia State University on the occasion of its 125th anniversary.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Mr. Scott (VA) moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 182.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

bill.summary: 3/6/2007--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Commends and congratulates Virginia State University on the occasion of its 125th anniversary.
